org.springdata.cassandra.mapping

Class CachingCassandraPersistentProperty

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.data.mapping.model.AbstractPersistentProperty<P>
      • org.springframework.data.mapping.model.AnnotationBasedPersistentProperty<CassandraPersistentProperty>
        • org.springdata.cassandra.mapping.BasicCassandraPersistentProperty
          • org.springdata.cassandra.mapping.CachingCassandraPersistentProperty
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CassandraPersistentProperty, org.springframework.data.mapping.PersistentProperty<CassandraPersistentProperty>

    public class CachingCassandraPersistentProperty
extends BasicCassandraPersistentProperty
    CassandraPersistentProperty caching access to isIdProperty() and getColumnName().
    Author:
    Alex Shvid
